text: is a railway station on the Hisatsu Line in Yatsushiro, Kumamoto, Japan, operated by Kyushu Railway Company (JR Kyushu). ==Lines== Dan Station is served by the Hisatsu Line. ==Layout== The station has one platform serving a two-way track. ==Adjacent stations== ==See also== * List of railway stations in Japan ==External links== * Category:Railway stations in Kumamoto Prefecture
title: Dan Station
